page.title: 13GAMES WE PLAY
page.content:
DOUBLE DUTCH
This is a girls' skipping game which requires two ropes. Two people, one at each end of the ropes, swing the ropes in opposite directions. A third person skips in the ropes. When that person makes a mistake, it is somebody else's turn. Sharon Long.
MAN HUNT
Man Hunt is a game for boys or girls. It can be played on foot or on bicycles. One person is nominated as the hunter and he has to catch someone and say "Man Hunt." When a person is caught, he becomes a hunter, too, and helps to catch the rest. Jason Howe.
